item.title: ðŸ’» Convex Hosting on a Home Lab with Docker and Orbstack
item.description: Self-hosting modern application backends is often a puzzle of configuration, especially when working with newer architectures and tools. Convex, with its focus on full-stack development, offers a self-hosted option that’s perfect for a home lab environment.
